Worship Service

Sunday Nov 17, 2019

We really enjoyed during this worship service that we can spend time with Jesus. We sang two songs: ‚ÄúWhen thou wakest in the morning‚Äù and ‚ÄúTake time to behold Him‚Äù. In the speaking, we learned that we can spend time with Jesus alone. It is good to take a few minutes each day to spend time with Jesus. Here are some things we can do during our time with the Lord:

  1. Calling ‚Äì Calling on the Name of the Lord to set our mind on the spirit ‚Äì 1 Cor.12:3; Rom. 8:6; 10:12-13 (1/2 Minute)
  2. Praying ‚Äì Opening our heart, softening our heart and emptying ourselves. Telling Him that we love Him ‚Äì 2 Cor. 3:16; Psa. 62:8 (1 Minute)
  3. Pray-reading ‚Äì Using our exercised spirit to pray over a verse or two. Turning the verses into a personal prayer ‚Äì Eph. 6:17-18; 2 Tim. 3:16 (2 1/2 Minutes)
  4. Confession ‚Äì Confessing the sins and offenses on our conscience and removing all blockages to fellowship. Asking for forgiveness and cleansing ‚Äì 1 John 1:7, 9; Psa. 66:18; Isa. 59:1-2 (1 Minute)
  5. Consecration ‚Äì Presenting ourselves to the Lord afresh, giving Him the full ground in us ‚Äì Rom. 12:1-2; 6:13,19; Mark 12:30 (1/2 Minute)
  6. Thanksgiving ‚Äì Giving thanks for all things; for all the persons, situations and things in your life and praising Him ‚Äì Eph. 5:20; 1 Thes. 5:18 (1/2 Minute)
  7. Petition ‚Äì Asking the Lord for needs, growth and persons that need salvation ‚Äì 1 Tim. 2:1: Eph. 6:18; Matt. 7:7; Psa. 143:8 (1 Minute)

Thursday Night Bible Study

Thursday Nov 14, 2019

Yeeeep, just some crazy lovers of Jesus üôå. So glad to be together and to read the word of God! We covered Matthew Chapter 7 and saw how we need to be careful in our labor for the Lord. We don‚Äôt want to be worker‚Äôs of lawlessness mentioned in verse 23. This chaptered showed that we can do many things for the Lord, yet the Lord may not approve them because he was not the initiator of these works. May we be like the prudent man in verse 24 who hears the word of the Lord and does them.
